casebody.data:
No. 430,

Misc.

Amalfitano v. LaVallee, Warden. Matthew Muraskin and Francis 3. Valentino for petitioner. Louis J. Lefkowitz, Attorney General of New York, Samuel A. Hirshowitz, First Assistant Attorney General, and Amy Juviler, Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari denied.
